ui_metadata.display_name: CIS Ubuntu Linux 24.04 LTS v1.0.0 L2 Workstation

variables.name: PASSWORD_ROOT_UNLOCK_TIME
variables.info: Amount of time in seconds access will be blocked after a lock out.

variables.name: PASSWORD_MIN_DAYS
variables.info: Minimum days between password changes parameter found in /etc/login.defs

variables.name: FIND_TIMEOUT
variables.description: Timeout for checks that search for files
variables.info: Timeout, in seconds, for checks that search for files. Range of 1-7200.

variables.name: MAX_AUDIT_LOG_FILE_SIZE
variables.info: The max size, in MBs, each audit log can be before log file rotation.
